definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: A golf course is nothing but a poolroom moved outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 不，高尔夫球场不过是一个会动的户外台。

sentences.english: The uniform of green speed on the Willow golf course was worse in Spring.
sentences.chinese: 高尔夫球场果岭球速春季比夏季和秋季较慢。

sentences.english: Let'sgo to the golf course this afternoon and tee off at 2o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天下午两点去高尔夫球场打球吧。

sentences.english: Thrill to the oceanfront finish on the Ernie Els golf course.
sentences.chinese: 令人兴奋的事上的海滨高尔夫球场埃尔斯完成。

sentences.english: The Pinehurst Resort has eight golf courses and a spa.
sentences.chinese: 松树林度假村有八个高尔夫球场，一个温泉浴场。

sentences.english: The doors opened and she found herself stepping out onto the putting green of a beautiful golf course.
sentences.chinese: 门打开了，她发现自己踏上了一片碧绿的高尔夫球场。

sentences.english: There is a superb 18-hole golf course 6 miles away.
sentences.chinese: 6英里外有一个一流的18洞高尔夫球场。

sentences.english: My uncle works at a golf court.
sentences.chinese: 我的叔皮在一间高尔夫球场工作。

sentences.english: An important technique of turf- case in golf course is applying fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 施肥是高尔夫球场草坪营养护养的一项重要手段。

sentences.english: The huangshan golf course site has left an everlasting impression on my golfing soal.
sentences.chinese: 黄山高尔夫球场现场给我留下了永恒的印象。

sentences.english: The problems on special operation and maintainance of golf courses were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了高尔夫球场草坪特殊作业护养的若干问题。

sentences.english: This is one golf course hidden in hurst, near sea and hill.
sentences.chinese: 这是树林里隐藏的高尔夫球场，少有的依山傍海。

sentences.english: Horse race court, swimming pool, golf-linke.
What is the yardage of this golf course?
A former greenskeeper, now, about to become the Masters champion.
sentences.chinese: 从前的高尔夫球场管理员，现在即将成为大师赛冠军。

sentences.english: I would miss him, especially on the golf course.
sentences.chinese: 在高尔夫球场上，我尤其会想念他。
